Class TroopHealthBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • TroopHealthBar
  • public class TroopHealthBar
extends greenfoot.Actor
    TroopHealthBar is a Greenfoot actor created based off of OZDWStatBar. It is a variant of OZDWStatBar that does not have the circular ability bar. It is a rectangular bar that is intended to be used as an HP/Shield bar, but it can be used for other applicable uses.

    The purpose of this class is to provide a well integrated statistical bar that can help provide visuals for health and any type of numerical bar that is required. This can provide a programmer easy access to a stats bar that is typically used in a RPG game.

    This class contains accessor (getter) and setter (update) methods.

    Version:
    April 23, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei & Owen Zhu

    • Constructor Detail

      • TroopHealthBar

        public TroopHealthBar()
        Creates a generic TroopHealthBar with default dimensions and values.

      • TroopHealthBar

        public TroopHealthBar​(int width,
                      int height,
                      int borderWidth,
                      int hpVal,
                      int maxHpVal,
                      Troops target,
                      int x,
                      int y)
        Creates an TroopHealthBar of the dimensions specified and with the values specified. All values must not be negative.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the bar.
        height - Height of the bar.
        borderWidth - Width of the border surrounding the bar.
        hpVal - Initial/starting value for the bar.
        maxHpVal - Maximum possible value for the bar.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act - do whatever the TroopHealthBar wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • update

        public void update​(int newVal)
        Updates the TroopHealthBar's current value with a new value. Also updates the appearance of the TroopHealthBar accordingly.
        Parameters:
        newVal - New value to update the TroopHealthBar with.

      • update

        public void update​(int newVal,
                   int newMax)
        Updates the TroopHealthBar's current value and current maximum value with new values. Also updates the appearance of the TroopHealthBar accordingly.
        Parameters:
        newVal - New value to update the TroopHealthBar with.
        newMax - New maximum value to update the TroopHealthBar with.

        public int getMaxHpValue()
        Gets the maximum hp value for this stat bar.
        Returns:
        int Maximum HP value (maxHpVal).
